data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "Think of an animal that is important in your country. What animal is it? Why is it important? Give specific reasons for your answer."
data.answer: The giant panda is an important animal in my country China. Pandas only exist in Sichuan province where they are protected by human intervention. It is a large black and white animal like a bear which is very rare. Since it is endemic to China, it is seen as a treasure in China and every Chinese loves it. It used to be an endangered specie but in 2016, it was reclassified on the IUCN Red List from "endangered" to "vulnerable", affirming decade-long efforts to save the panda. Therefore, it proves the importance of pandas in China.
